flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
info: Toggle a Unit's Resilience.
name: Adrenaline Rush

flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
info: When you have 5 or more Elf Allies, play this Unit from your Deck.
name: Aelirenn

flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
info: Play a Bronze or Silver Weather card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back into your Deck.
name: Aeromancy

flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
info: Deploy: You may Resurrect a Special card from your opponent's Graveyard. If you do, Weaken self by 4.
name: Aglaïs

flavor: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis… or die.
info:
After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, play an Alba Pikeman from your Deck on the row.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
name: Alba Pikeman

flavor: Death and glory!
info: Deploy: Give this Unit a Shield.
name: Alba Spearmen

flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.
info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, each player draws the top card from their Deck. Your opponent's card is Revealed.
name: Albrich

flavor: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo…
info: Deploy: Reveal a card.
name: Alchemist

flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
info: Boost one of the Highest Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 2 and play it.
name: Alzur's Double–Cross

flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
info: Damage a Unit by 7.
name: Alzur's Thunder

flavor: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.
info: Deploy: Boost an Ally by 10.
name: Ambassador

flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost self by 1 if Fog is anywhere on the Board.
name: Ancient Foglet

flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.
info: Deploy: Play all Arachasae from your Deck.
name: Arachas

flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
info:
Whenever an Ally Consumes a card, Spawn an Arachas and Damage self by 1 (ignoring Armor).
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
name: Arachas Behemoth

flavor: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.
info: Damage 3 adjacent Units by 4.
name: Arachas Venom

flavor: It's a griffin, just more… griffiny.
info: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side.
name: Archgriffin

flavor: The adepts' every whim is catered to - they live like princesses at Aretuza. And in turn half the city lives off servicing them: seamstresses, milliners, confectioners, delivery boys…
info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Weather card from your Deck.
name: Aretuza Adept

flavor: How much is a human life worth?
info: Lock and Destroy an Enemy.
name: Assassination

flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.
info: Deploy: Shuffle up to 2 cards from either Graveyard into that player's Deck.
name: Assire var Anahid

flavor: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?
info: Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 1 as well.
name: Auckes

flavor: You humans have… unusual tastes.
info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, both players draw the top 2 cards from their Deck.
name: Avallac'h

flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy and up to 3 other random Enemies with the same Power by 1.
Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.
name: Ballista

flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Dwarf from your Deck and Boost it by 3.
name: Barclay Els

flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
info: Swap the Power of the Highest and Lowest Unit.
name: Bekker's Twisted Mirror

flavor: Now finish your soup, or a berserker'll come and swallow ye whole.
info: Deploy: Strengthen self by 1 for each Damaged Ally (including Golds), then Damage self by 1.
name: Berserker Marauder

flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
info:
Deploy: Move a Unit from your opponent's Graveyard to yours.
Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage self by 1 and Units adjacent to this Unit by 2.
name: Birna Bran

flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
info:
Apply Frost to a row on your opponent's side.
Frost: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage one of the Lowest Units on the row by 2.
name: Biting Frost

flavor: I aim for the knees. Always.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Boosted, Damage it by 5 instead.
name: Black Infantry Arbalest

flavor: First we ran into a bear… things just got worse from there.
info:
Destroy an Ally.
Spawn a Bear.
name: Bloodcurdling Roar

flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
info:
If this Unit is in your Deck at the end of the Round, place it on top.
Whenever an Enemy is Destroyed during a Round while this Unit is in your Deck, Boost it by 1.
name: Bloody Baron

flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
info:
Whenever this Unit is moved, Boost it by 2.
Deploy: Play all Blue Mountain Commandos from your Deck.
name: Blue Mountain Commando

flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
info:
Whenever a different Ally with the same Power as this Unit is played, play this Unit from your Deck (1 copy max) and place it on that Ally's row.
Whenever you complete a Blue Stripes Commando Trio, create 1 base copy of a Blue Stripes Commando on the bottom of your Deck.
name: Blue Stripes Commando

flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
info:
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side.
Crewmen 1.
name: Blue Stripes Scout

flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Spawn a Spectral Whale on your opponent's side.
name: Blueboy Lugos

flavor: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper – else they'll come back to haunt you.
info:
Deploy: Boost all Lubberkins in your Hand, Deck and Graveyard by 5.
Deathwish: Play a Lubberkin from your Deck.
name: Botchling

flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by this Unit's Power.
name: Braenn

flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
info:
Spawn Brouver Hoog
Deploy: Play a Silver Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
name: Brouver Hoog

flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
info: Deploy: If playing as Nilfgaard, trigger your Leader's Deploy ability.
name: Cahir

flavor: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.
info: Deploy: Draw the top card from your Deck. Keep it, or place it at the bottom of your Deck and draw the new top card.
name: Cantarella

flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
info: Deploy: Move 3 Enemies to this Unit's row on your opponent's side and apply Frost to that row on that side only.
name: Caranthir

flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.
info: Deploy: Resurrect a Unit from your opponent's Graveyard.
name: Caretaker

flavor: Your Imperial Highness… blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. I beg your pardon, but Cahir… My son...
info: Deploy: Move 2 Bronze Spying Enemies to your side.
name: Ceallach

flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.
info: Deploy: Spawn 2 Harpy Eggs to the left of this Unit.
name: Celaeno Harpy

flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.
info: After 4 Units are Resurrected on your side while this Unit is in the Graveyard, Resurrect it.
name: Cerys

flavor: He'll not reveal his name till he's defeated. He's a troll errant, see?
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Strengthen this Unit by 2 if it is the only Unit on the row.
name: Champion of Champions

flavor: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!
info: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 4.
name: Chort

flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock and move it to this row on its side.
name: Ciaran

flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
info: At the end of the Round, return this Unit to your Hand if you lost.
name: Ciri

flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
info: When this Unit enters the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3 and shuffle it back into your Deck.
name: Ciri: Dash

flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Damage 3 Units by 1.
name: Clan Brokvar Archer

flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…
info:
Whenever a Unit adjacent to this Unit is Damaged, Strengthen self by 1.
Deploy: Damage a Unit by 3.
name: Clan Brokvar Hunter

flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Discard all copies of this Unit from your Deck.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate

flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
info:
Veteran 1.
Whenever a Unit is Discarded to your Graveyard, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain

flavor: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.
info: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 2. If it was already Damaged, play a Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden from your Deck.
name: Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden

flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Boost 3 Units to the left by 3, 2 and 1 respectively.
name: Clan Heymaey Skald

flavor: Ye're in for a poundin'.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Heal 3 Units to the left.
name: Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith

flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Strengthen an Ally by 2.
name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith

flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
info:
Whenever an Enemy is Damaged, Boost self by 1.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
name: Clan Tuirseach Axeman

flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.
info:
Veteran 1.
Whenever this Unit enters the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3.
name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers

flavor: We are An Craite! What others buy with gold, we buy with our lifeblood.
info:
Veteran 1.
Whenever this Unit is Discarded, Resurrect it immediately.
name: Clan an Craite Raider

flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Boost 3 Damaged Units to the left by half their Power (rounding down).
name: Clan an Craite Warcrier

flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Damage self by 1.
name: Clan an Craite Warrior

flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.
info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock.
name: Cleaver

flavor: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.
info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Resilience.
name: Combat Engineer

flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
info: Boost 5 adjacent Units by 4.
name: Commander's Horn

flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.
info: Whenever you Mulligan a card, Damage a random Enemy by 2.
name: Commando Neophyte

flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
info: Deploy: Pick a Unit and Damage all Units on its row by half their Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).
name: Coral

flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
info:
Spawn Crach an Craite
Deploy: Play the Highest Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck, Strengthen it by 3 and Damage it by 1.
name: Crach an Craite

flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.
info: Deploy: Play Whispess and Weavess from your Deck.
name: Crone: Brewess

flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
info: Deploy: Play Brewess and Whispess from your Deck.
name: Crone: Weavess

flavor: I'd be your best – and last.
info: Deploy: Play Brewess and Weavess from your Deck.
name: Crone: Whispess

flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.
info: Deploy: Reveal one of the Highest Units in your opponent's Hand (including Golds) and Boost self by its Power.
name: Cynthia

flavor: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo The Cleaver Varese and the King of Beggars.
info: Deploy: Weaken a Unit by 3 or Destroy an Ambush Unit.
name: Cyprian Wiley

flavor: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.
info: Whenever this Unit is Revealed, play it and draw the top card from your Deck.
name: Daerlan Foot Soldiers

flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.
info:
Spawn Dagon.
Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain.
name: Dagon

flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
info: Deploy: Boost up to 3 Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 3, then shuffle your Deck.
name: Dandelion

flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
info: Return an Ally to your Hand, Boost it by 3 and play it.
name: Decoy

flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.
info: Deploy: Strengthen all other Bronze and Silver Dwarves in your Deck, Hand and on your side of the Board by 1.
name: Dennis Cranmer

flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…
info: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Alzur's Thunder.
name: Dethmold

flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
info: Deploy: Play the top 2 cards in your Deck.
name: Dijkstra

flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
info: Choose 3 adjacent Units (can be Golds) and Reset them. If any are Gold, Demote them first.
name: Dimeritium Bomb

flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.
info: Choose a Unit (can be Gold) and toggle its Lock. If it is Gold, Demote it first.
name: Dimeritium Shackles

flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Damage 3 Allies by 1 and Strengthen self by 1 for each.
name: Djenge Frett

flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
info: Deploy: Damage Enemies by 3 and then 1.
name: Dol Blathanna Archer

flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.
info:
Every time this Unit is moved, Damage a random Enemy by 2.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2.
name: Dol Blathanna Marksman

flavor: As long as we stand, no human foot shall trample Dol Blathanna's meadows.
info: Whenever you play a Special card, Boost this Unit by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
name: Dol Blathanna Protector

flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
info: Deploy: Spawn a Fireball Trap on an opposing row.
name: Dol Blathanna Trapper

flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock. Discard a random Bronze card from your opponent's Deck to your Graveyard.
name: Donar an Hindar

flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
info: Deploy: Strengthen up to 2 Units in your Graveyard by 3.
name: Draig Bon–Dhu

flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
info: Deploy: Damage a random Enemy by 1 (ignoring Armor). Repeat 6 times.
name: Draug

flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.
info:
Apply Drought to all rows on your opponent's side.
Drought: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage one of the Lowest Units on the row by 2.
name: Drought

flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
info: Deploy: Move a Unit to this row on its side.
name: Drowner

flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.
info: Deploy: Choose an Enemy and copy its Power.
name: Dudu

flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
info: Deploy: Remove Armor from 2 Units and Boost self by the amount of Armor removed.
name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry

flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.
info: If at the start of your turn you have not passed and are losing the Round by more than 20 Power, play this Unit from your Deck.
name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry

flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
info: Deploy: Move a Unit on another row to this row on its side. If it's an Ally, Boost it by 3.
name: Dwarven Mercenary

flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If the Unit was not Destroyed, Boost self by 2.
name: Dwarven Skirmisher

flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
info:
Deploy: Give this Unit a Shield.
Deathwish: Spawn 2 Lesser Earth Elementals at the end of the row.
name: Earth Elemental

flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.
info:
Spawn Eithné
Deploy: Resurrect a Special card.
name: Eithné

flavor: Who would think that overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?
info:
Deploy: Gain Resilience.
Deploy: Consume an Ally.
name: Ekimmara

flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
info: Deploy: Destroy an Ally and Damage an Enemy by the Destroyed Ally's Power.
name: Ele'yas

flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 Bronze Special cards in your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
name: Elven Mercenary

flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
info: Whenever you Mulligan this Unit, play it from your Deck immediately.
name: Elven Wardancer

flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
info:
Spawn Emhyr var Emreis
Deploy: Return an Ally to your Hand, then play a card from your Hand (can be Gold).
name: Emhyr var Emreis

flavor: But… but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!
info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 Bronze Units (not including Emissaries) from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
name: Emissary

flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
info: Destroy all the Lowest Units.
name: Epidemic

flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
info:
Spawn Eredin.
Deploy: Spawn a Bronze Wild Hunt Unit.
name: Eredin

flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck, then Discard 2 cards (can be Golds) from your Hand.
name: Ermion

flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
info: Deploy: Play Vesemir and Lambert from your Deck.
name: Eskel

flavor: Here she comes, he thought, our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire.
info:
If this Unit is Spying at the start of your turn, Boost it by 1. If it is Spying when your opponent passes, move it to the opposite side.
Deploy: When you play this Unit on your side, Strengthen it by 3.
name: Fake Ciri

flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally and shuffle it back into your Deck, then play a random Bronze Unit from your Deck.
name: Field Medic

flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock. If it's an Enemy, Damage it by half its Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).
name: Fiend

flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
info: Deploy: Spawn 3 Lesser Fire Elementals.
name: Fire Elemental

flavor: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.
info:
Whenever this Unit is Revealed, Damage a random Enemy by 3.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3.
name: Fire Scorpion

flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
info: Spawn Clear Skies or Rally.
name: First Light

flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
info:
Whenever you apply Fog to an opposing row, play this Unit from your Deck or Resurrect it on that row on your side.
When all Fog has been cleared from the Board, Destroy this Unit.
name: Foglet

flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
info:
Spawn Foltest
Deploy: Boost all Loyal Bronze and Silver Units in your Hand and Deck by 1.
name: Foltest

flavor: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.
info:
Spawn Francesca
Deploy: Mulligan up to 3 cards.
name: Francesca

flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
info: Deploy: Move a Unit on another row on this side to this row. Draw the top card from your Deck.
name: Frightener

flavor: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.
info:
Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1.
Deploy: Set the Power of the Unit on the right to that of the Unit on the left.
name: Fringilla Vigo

flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
info: Deploy: Guess whether a random Bronze or Silver Unit from your opponent's Deck is Higher or Lower than 5. Success: Play any card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back. Failure: Your opponent draws the top Bronze or Silver card from their Deck. Tie: Both players draw the top Bronze or Silver card from their Deck.
name: Gaunter O'Dimm

flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
info: Deploy: Draw the top Gold card and top Silver card from your Deck. Play one and return the other to the top of your Deck.
name: Ge'els

flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
info: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 3.
name: Geralt

flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
info: Deploy: Push 5 adjacent Enemies to the row above them and Damage them by 2.
name: Geralt: Aard

flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
info: Deploy: Destroy all the Highest Units on the opposite row if that row totals 20 or more Power.
name: Geralt: Igni

flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
info: Deploy: Consume a random Unit from either Graveyard.
name: Ghoul

flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
info: Deploy: Consume a card in your Hand, then draw the top card from your Deck.
name: Giant Toad

flavor: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow – and whipping prey.
info: After 1 turn, at the start of your turn, Consume all Units in your Graveyard, but only Boost self by 1 for each.
name: Grave Hag

flavor: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
info: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Bloodcurdling Roar.
name: Gremist

flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
info: Deploy: Move a card from one Graveyard to the other.
name: Griffin

flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.
info:
Spawn Harald the Cripple
Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5. If this Destroys it, repeat this ability with Damage Power reduced by 1.
name: Harald the Cripple

flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.
info: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of Units adjacent to this Unit.
name: Harpy

flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
info: Deploy: Boost 2 Units to the right by 3.
name: Hawker Healer

flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.
info: Whenever an Enemy appears, Boost self by 1.
name: Hawker Smuggler

flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
info: Deploy: Boost a Unit in your Hand by 3.
name: Hawker Support

flavor: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.
info:
Spawn Henselt
Deploy: Choose a Bronze Ally. Play all copies of it from your Deck.
name: Henselt

flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
info: Deploy: Spawn the Lord of Undvik on the leftmost side of the opposite row.
name: Hjalmar

flavor: Now let's drink to Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen one of the Highest Units in your Graveyard by 3.
name: Holger Blackhand

flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
info: If Frost is anywhere on the Board, Boost self by 5. When the last Frost is cleared, Damage self by 5.
name: Ice Giant

flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
info: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Quen Sign.
name: Ida Emean

flavor: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If the Enemy is under Frost, Damage it by 8 instead.
name: Imlerith

flavor: The witcher moved with unnatural speed. Too fast for the human eye to register.
info: Add 3 Armor to 3 adjacent Units and Boost them by 3.
name: Immune Boost

flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
info:
Apply Fog to a row on your opponent's side.
Fog: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Highest Unit on the row by 2.
name: Impenetrable Fog

flavor: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.
info:
Whenever you play a Spying Unit (including Golds), Boost self by 2.
Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each Spying Enemy (including Golds).
name: Impera Brigade

flavor: Members of the emperor's fanatic body guard fight to the bitter end.
info: Deploy: Look at the top card in your Deck. If it's Bronze, gain 2 Armor. If it's Silver, Boost self by 1. If it's Gold, Promote self.
name: Impera Enforcers

flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…
info: Orders: Play this Unit from your Deck.
name: Imperial Golem

flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
info:
Whenever an Enemy moves to a different row, Damage it by 2.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4.
name: Iorveth

flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.
info: Deathwish: Boost all Units on the other side of the Board by 3.
name: Iris

flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
info: Play a Bronze or Silver Ambush card from your Deck.
name: Isengrim

flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.
info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Special card from your Deck, then Spawn a copy of it. Shuffle the others back.
name: Ithlinne

flavor: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as incompetent would be far too kind.
info: Deploy: Play the top Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck and Boost it by 10.
name: Joachim de Wett

flavor: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.
info:
Spawn John Calveit
Deploy: Look at the top 3 Bronze or Silver cards in your Deck. Play 1. The others remain on top.
name: John Calveit

flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
info: Deploy: Force all Northern Realms Machine Allies to Damage a random Enemy by 2.
name: John Natalis

flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.
info: Deploy: Discard a card from your Hand (can be Gold), then create a copy in your Hand of a card of the same color in your opponent's Deck.
name: Johnny

flavor: Skellige legend claims the mighty and terrible Jotunn, King of Giants, reigned over the isles in ancient times. He was slain by Hemdall, but with his dying breath he vowed to return for Ragh nar Roog.
info: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent Enemies to this Unit's row on their side and Damage them by 2.
name: Jotunn

flavor: Some call her the Iron Maiden.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Damage self by 1.
name: Jutta an Dimun

flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
info:
Deploy: Boost by 1 this Unit and all Bronze Loyal Units with the same Power in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
Crewmen 1.
name: Kaedweni Sergeant

flavor: I never miss twice.
info:
Deploy: Return a Machine Ally to your Hand and immediately play it again.
Crewmen 1.
name: Kaedweni Siege Platform

flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.
info:
Whenever an Ally appears, Boost it by 1. If it's a Machine, Boost it by 1 and add 1 Armor.
Crewmen 1.
name: Kaedweni Siege Support

flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
info: After 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Spawn Hemdall.
name: Kambi

flavor: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.
info: Deploy: Consume a Unit from either Graveyard.
name: Katakan

flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.
info: Deploy: Consume a Unit from your Hand, then Boost self by an additional 8.
name: Kayran

flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.
info: Deploy: Spawn Quen Sign, Epidemic or Thunderbolt Potion.
name: Keira Metz

flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.
info:
Spawn King Bran
Deploy: Discard up to 3 cards from your Deck and Strengthen all Units among them by 1. Then shuffle your deck.
name: King Bran

flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
info: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self enough to tie the Round or to a maximum of 15 base Power.
name: King of Beggars

flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
info: Damage all Units on a row by 3.
name: Lacerate

flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
info: Deploy: Play Eskel and Vesemir from your Deck.
name: Lambert

flavor: He would just sit there and stare at me, not saying a word. His eyes, they were… fish-like, somehow. No brows, no lashes… Just these balls of water, with a black stone sunk in each. He would devour me with those eyes in total silence. That frightened me more than the beatings.
info: Deploy: Reveal a Unit in your Hand (can be Gold) and Damage an Enemy by its base Power.
name: Leo Bonhart

flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.
info:
Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1.
Deploy: Banish 2 Units to each side of this Unit and Boost this Unit by their Power.
name: Letho of Gulet

flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Unit to the right by 1, then Strengthen self by 2.
name: Light Longship

flavor: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.
info:
Deploy: Boost all Botchlings in your Hand, Deck and Graveyard by 5.
Deathwish: Play a Botchling from your Deck.
name: Lubberkin

flavor: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!
info: Deploy: Discard a Bronze Unit from your Deck and Damage a Unit by the Discarded Unit's base Power.
name: Madman Lugos

flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
info: Deploy: Gain Resilience.
name: Mahakam Defender

flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
info: Deploy: Boost an Ally by 3. If it's a Dwarf, Boost by 4 instead.
name: Mahakam Guard

flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, move a random Unit on another row on this side to this row.
Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.
name: Malena

flavor: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.
info: Whenever a card is Revealed, Damage a random Enemy by 2.
name: Mangonel

flavor: We know little about what manticores look like: though many have seen them, very few have lived to tell their tale.
info: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 4.
name: Manticore

flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
info: Damage 5 adjacent Units by 4.
name: Manticore Venom

flavor: We are but pawns in a game played by old men, sent to fight and die on their senile whims…
info: Boost one of the Lowest Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 2 and play it.
name: Marching Orders

flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…
info: Spawn Spores or Mutagen.
name: Mardroeme

flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
info: Deploy: Reset a Unit and toggle its Lock.
name: Margarita Laux–Antille

flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.
info: Deploy: Destroy all Spying Enemies.
name: Menno Coehoorn

flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.
info: Damage all Units on a row by half their Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).
name: Merigold's Hailstorm

flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, return the Highest Enemy to your opponent's Hand, then return the Highest Ally to your Hand.
name: Milva

flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
info: Spawn a Bronze Necrophage or Insectoid Unit and Boost it by 2.
name: Monster Nest

flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
info: Ambush: When an Enemy appears, turn Morenn over and Damage that Enemy by 5 before its Deploy ability resolves.
name: Morenn

flavor: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
info: Whenever this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Resurrect it and Weaken it by half its Power (rounding up).
name: Morkvarg

flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.
info:
Spawn Morvran Voorhis
Deploy: Reveal up to 3 cards from either player's Hand (can be Golds).
name: Morvran Voorhis

flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
info: Deploy: Damage Units by 2, 2 and then 1.
name: Myrgtabrakke

flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
info: Play a Bronze or Silver Special card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
name: Nature's Gift

flavor: They call us Death's Heads. Care to find out why?
info: Deploy: Damage a Spying Unit by 5. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen self by 4.
name: Nauzicaa Brigade

flavor: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.
info: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side and Boost 1 Ally or Revealed Unit in your Hand by 3.
name: Nauzicaa Standard Bearer

flavor: We have ways of making you talk… alive or dead.
info: Banish a Unit from either Graveyard and Boost an Ally by its Power.
name: Necromancy

flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
info:
Whenever an Ally Consumes a card while this Unit is in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board, Boost self by 1.
Deathwish: Play a Nekker from your Deck.
name: Nekker

flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
info: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Ally and create 2 base copies of it on the bottom of your Deck.
name: Nekker Warrior

flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
info: Deploy: Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Graveyard into your Deck.
name: Nenneke

flavor: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, form the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.
info:
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
Deploy: Reveal a random card from your Hand (can be Gold).
name: Nilfgaardian Knight

flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
info: Frost Damage on your opponent's side is increased to 3.
name: Nithral

flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
info: After 4 turns, at the start of your turn, Damage all Enemies by 1, return this Unit to your Hand and Transform it into Exhausted Ocvist.
name: Ocvist

flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, move this Unit to a random row and Boost all Units on it by 1.
name: Odrin

flavor: Do not disturb.
info:
If at the start of your turn there are 3 or more Units on the opposite row, wake up.
Deploy: Boost Units adjacent to this Unit by 1.
name: Old Speartip: Asleep

flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
info: When this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Weaken it by half (rounding up). At the start of Rounds 2 and 3, Resurrect this Unit if it is in the Graveyard.
name: Olgierd

flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
info: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Unit in your Hand and create a base copy of it in both players' Hands.
name: Operator

flavor: While deadly for men, Potions are merely toxic for witchers. Yet even they must measure every drop, lest they exceed the maximum dosage... and pay the maximum price.
info: Boost up to 6 random Allies by 2.
name: Overdose

flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, shuffle the Lowest Ally into your Deck, then shuffle the Lowest Enemy into your opponent's Deck. Does not affect Pavetta.
name: Pavetta

flavor: These are not the hands of an Excellency, but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.
info: Deploy: Reset a Unit. If it's an Ally, Strengthen it by 3. If it's an Enemy, Weaken it by 3.
name: Peter Saar Gwynleve

flavor: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 5, then Damage random Enemies by 4, 3, 2 and 1. The same Enemy cannot be Damaged twice in a row.
name: Philippa Eilhart

flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit.
name: Priestess of Freya

flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
info:
Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Boost this Unit by the number of Machine Allies.
Crewmen 1.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
name: Prince Stennis

flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
info: Every turn, at the end of your turn, Boost a random Ally (but never self) by 3. Ability discontinues after the Unit Boosts Allies 4 times without leaving the Board.
name: Priscilla

flavor: Mooooo.
info:
Retaliation: Spawn a Chort on the row.
Deathwish: Spawn a Chort on the row.
name: Prize-Winning Cow

flavor: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
info: Deploy: Resurrect all your Queensguards.
name: Queensguard

flavor: The witcher raised a hand and quickly traced a path with it in the air. The crowd's rumble rose, the stones flew thicker. Yet the Sign curved their course, pushing them aside. They simply passed their target, protected by a shield unseen.
info: Choose a Unit in your Hand. Give all copies of it in your Hand and Deck a Shield and Boost them by 2. Units which already have a Shield cannot be chosen and aren't affected.
name: Quen Sign

flavor: A king should be merciless towards his enemies and generous to his friends.
info:
Spawn Radovid
Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 4 as well.
name: Radovid

flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
info:
Apply Ragh Nar Roog to all rows on your opponent's side.
Ragh Nar Roog: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage one of the Highest Units on the row by 2.
name: Ragh Nar Roog

flavor: In their ballads skalds claim you cannot tell a berserker changed in the heat of battle from a true–born bear.
info: Retaliation: Transform into a Raging Bear.
name: Raging Berserker

flavor: When Cintra fell, Attre followed, leaving its defenders a choice: accept the Nilfgaardian leash or die.
info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Disloyal Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
name: Rainfarn

flavor: See this here tattoo? 'At's me, hackin' at a dragon. A DRAGON, m'lady.
info:
Deploy or Bond: Boost all Reaver Hunters in your Hand, Deck and on your side of the Board by 1.
When a Reaver Hunter Trio is completed, Damage the Highest Enemy by half its Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).
name: Reaver Hunter

flavor: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.
info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally. Play a copy of it from your Deck.
name: Reaver Scout

flavor: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
info:
Whenever this Unit's Armor reaches 0, Boost self by 5.
Deploy: Gain 4 Armor.
name: Redanian Elite

flavor: For glory! For Radovid!
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, if this Unit has no Armor, Boost it by 2 and add 2 Armor to it.
name: Redanian Knight

flavor: Not wealth or fame but intentions true –– that's what makes a hero of you!
info:
If this Unit has Armor at the start of your turn, Boost Units adjacent to it by 1.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.
name: Redanian Knight-Elect

flavor: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
info: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Boost self by 7 if you are winning the Round.
name: Regis

flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.
info: Deploy: Look at 3 random Bronze Units from your opponent's Deck. Consume 1, Boost self by base Power of the consumed Unit,  then shuffle the others back.
name: Regis: Higher Vampire

flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2.
Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.
name: Reinforced Ballista

flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
info:
Deploy: Add 2 Armor to Units adjacent to this Unit.
Fresh Crew: Boost self by 3.
name: Reinforced Siege Tower

flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage a random Enemy by 1.
name: Reinforced Trebuchet

flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!
info: Play a Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
name: Reinforcement

flavor: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.
info: Resurrect a Gold Unit from your Graveyard.
name: Renew

flavor: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
info: Return a Unit from your Graveyard to your Hand, then Discard a card from your Hand.
name: Restore

flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
info: Whenever you play a Gold Unit from your Hand, play Roach from your Deck on a random row before that Unit's Deploy ability resolves.
name: Roach

flavor: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.
info: Deploy: Spawn a Cow Carcass on your opponent's side.
name: Rot Tosser

flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…
info: Play a Gold card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.
name: Royal Decree

flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
info: Deathwish: Set all Units on the row to the Power of the Lowest Unit on the row.
name: Sabrina Glevissig

flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.
info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Dwarf Ally (including Golds). Damage an Enemy by the number of Elf Allies (including Golds).
name: Saesenthessis

flavor: Little Sarah wants to play!
info: Deploy: Shuffle a card from your Hand (can be Gold) back into your Deck, then draw the top different card of the same color from your Deck.
name: Sarah

flavor: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.
info: Orders: Play this Unit from your Deck on a random row.
name: Saskia

flavor: Tame? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
info: After an Enemy is played from any Hand and its Deploy ability resolves, Damage it by 1.
name: Savage Bear

flavor: Time to look death in the face.
info: Deploy: You may Transform a card from your Hand (can be Gold) into Scorch.
name: Schirrú

flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
info: Destroy all the Highest Units.
name: Scorch

flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.
info: Deploy: Set the Power of a Revealed Unit in your opponent's Hand to 1.
name: Serrit

flavor: Fear not the shadows, but the light.
info: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of 3 Units to the right.
name: Shadow

flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.
info: Deploy: Resurrect a Unit and add 4 Armor to it.
name: Shani

flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
info: Deploy: Move all Units on the row to random rows on the same side and Boost self by 1 for each.
name: Sheldon Skaggs

flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
info: Deploy: Resurrect a Unit.
name: Sigrdrifa

flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
info:
Apply Skellige Storm to a row on your opponent's side.
Skellige Storm: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the leftmost units on the row by 2, 2 and 1, respectively.
name: Skellige Storm

flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!
info:
Veteran 1.
After 2 turns, at the end of your turn, convert this Unit's current Power into base Power.
name: Skjall

flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.
info: Whenever either player Reveals a card, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
name: Spotter

flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
info: Damage up to 6 random Enemies by 2.
name: Stammelford's Tremors

flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.
info: Deploy: Choose any card from your Deck and place it on top. Then shuffle the rest of your Deck.
name: Stefan Skellen

flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…
info: If played on your opponent's side, then after 2 turns, at the end of your turn, move the Highest other Unit on its row to your side.
name: Succubus

flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.
info: Spawn a base copy of the last Enemy your opponent played from their Hand.
name: Summoning Circle

flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Draw the top card from your Deck, then Discard a card from your Hand (can be Gold).
name: Svanrige

flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
info: Boost a Unit by 8.
name: Swallow Potion

flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.
info: Deploy: Choose an Enemy or a Revealed opposing Unit and move all copies of it from your opponent's Deck to their Graveyard.
name: Sweers

flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
info: Deploy: You may play a Bronze Special card from your Hand. If you do, draw the top card from your Deck.
name: Síle de Tansarville

flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!
info: Deploy: Play all Temerian Infantrymen from your Deck on the row.
name: Temerian Infantryman

flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck. Keep 1 and shuffle the other back.
name: Thaler

flavor: Stone fists to stop intruders armed with swords. Ironclad logic to stop those armed with lies.
info: Deathwish: Create 2 Lesser Guardians on the top of your opponent's Deck.
name: The Guardian

flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
info: Draw your top 2 Bronze or Silver cards. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.
name: The Last Wish

flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
info: Boost 3 adjacent Units by 4.
name: Thunderbolt Potion

flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.
info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, Boost self by 15, then your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their Deck and Reveals it.
name: Tibor Eggebracht

flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
info:
Apply Rain to a row on your opponent's side.
Rain: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage up to 5 of the Lowest Units on the row by 1.
name: Torrential Rain

flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
info: Ambush: When your opponent passes, turn this Unit over and Boost 2 Units on each side by 2.
name: Toruviel

flavor: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulders of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.
info: Play the bottom card from your opponent's Deck.
name: Treason

flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
info:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent Enemies by 1.
Fresh Crew: Increase the Damage dealt by 1.
name: Trebuchet

flavor: Soldiers loyal to the old baron of Tridam left the city with Falibor, thus becoming renegades wanted by the law.
info: Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.
name: Tridam Infantryman

flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
info: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5.
name: Triss Merigold

flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost all other Lowest Allies by 1.
name: Triss: Butterfly Spell

flavor: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got – guard boatses.
info:
Counts as part of any Northern Realms Trio on the row.
Deploy: Gain 5 Armor.
name: Trollololo

flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck. Keep one and Discard the other.
name: Udalryk

flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.
info:
Spawn Unseen Elder.
Deploy: Consume 3 Allies, but Strengthen instead of Boosting.
name: Unseen Elder

flavor: Blood for Svalblod! Skulls for his throne!
info: Every turn, at the end of your turn, Damage by 2 every Damaged Enemy with 2 Power or less.
name: Vabjorn

flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.
info: Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Clear Skies or Stammelford's Tremors.
name: Vanhemar

flavor: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.
info: Deploy: Reveal up to 2 cards from your Hand (can be Golds). For each, Reveal 1 random card from your opponent's Hand (can be Gold).
name: Vattier de Rideaux

flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Destroyed, Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando on a random row and repeat the Deploy ability (one time only).
name: Vernon Roche

flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
info: Whenever you complete a Northern Realms Trio, play this Unit from your Deck.
name: Ves

flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
info: Deploy: Play Eskel and Lambert from your Deck.
name: Vesemir

flavor: The world has known as many plagues as it has wars. Yet both war and plague always take men by surprise.
info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit from your opponent's Graveyard.
name: Vicovaro Medic

flavor: Mages in Nilfgaard are disposable. If one disappoints the Emperor, a dozen others await to provide what he requires.
info: Deploy: Trigger the ability of a Spying Enemy Ambassador or Emissary.
name: Vicovaro Novice

flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.
info: Deploy: Destroy an Ally or (only possible if your opponent has not passed) an Enemy. If you destroy an Ally, play the top card from your Deck. If you destroy an Enemy, your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their Deck and Reveals it.
name: Vilgefortz

flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
info: After 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Destroy all the Highest Units on the Board.
name: Villentretenmerth

flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
info:
Deploy: Consume the Unit to the right.
Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Consume the Unit to the right.
name: Vran Warrior

flavor: Vrihedd? What's that mean? Trouble.
info: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side and move a Unit to this row on its side.
name: Vrihedd Brigade

flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost a random Loyal Unit in your Hand by 1.
name: Vrihedd Dragoon

flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
info: Deploy: Mulligan a card.
name: Vrihedd Officer

flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
info: Ambush: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, turn this Unit over.
name: Vrihedd Sappers

flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
info: Whenever you Mulligan a card, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
name: Vrihedd Vanguard

flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
info: Whenever you Discard a Unit, Damage a random Enemy by 2.
name: War Longship

flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
info: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Lacerate.
name: Water Hag

flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
info:
Apply Frost to a row on your opponent's side and the row above it.
Frost: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage one of the Lowest Units on the row by 2.
name: White Frost

flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Strengthen the Unit to the left by 1 and Damage the Unit to the right by 1.
name: Wild Boar of the Sea

flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.
info: Deploy: Play a Biting Frost card from your Deck.
name: Wild Hunt Hound

flavor: For hundreds of years, Avallac'h tried to recreate the Elder Blood gene through back breeding - yet the elven children thus fostered were but dim sparks compared to Lara's flame.
info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Wild Hunt Ally. Play a copy of it from your Deck.
name: Wild Hunt Navigator

flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
info:
At the end of the Round, keep this Unit on the Board if you lost.
If this Unit is part of a Trio at the end of your turn, Boost it by 1.
name: Wild Hunt Rider

flavor: The White Frost is coming.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Destroyed, Boost self by 2.
name: Wild Hunt Warrior

flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
info: Deploy: Spawn 3 Rabid Wolves and apply Fog to the opposite row.
name: Woodland Spirit

flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3.
name: Wyvern

flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…
info: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's Deck. You may move 1 to the bottom of their Deck.
name: Xarthisius

flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
info: Deploy: Draw the top Unit and top Special card from your Deck. Keep 1 and shuffle the other back.
name: Yaevinn

flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
info:
Whenever a Dwarf Ally (including Golds) is played, Boost self by 1.
Deploy: Gain Resilience.
name: Yarpen Zigrin

flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
info: Deploy: Spawn a Unicorn or a Chironex.
name: Yennefer

flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.
info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage all the Highest Enemies by 1.
name: Yennefer: The Conjurer

flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
info: Deploy: Move 3 Units to this row on their side. If they are Allies, Strengthen them by 2.
name: Zoltan Chivay

flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
info: Deploy: Spawn Field Marshal Duda Companion or Field Marshal Duda Agitator.
name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer
